77073.summary: Some customers in Bowen Island are experiencing an interruption to Internet, Television and Home Phone services. We are working to restore service as quickly as possible and apologize for any inconvenience this may cause.
77073.title: May 21 - Bowen Island | All Services - Outage (Fix In Progress)
